content.raw:
I guess that for the developers the ideal place would be in the plugins tutorial ( http://gazebosim.org/tutorials/?cat=write_plugin ).
However I guess this would mean to change all the CMake files for the plugins tutorial for Gazebo 4.0, that is not desirable. 

By the way there is reason behind the pervasive use of `pkg_check_modules(GAZEBO gazebo)` instead of the standard `find_package(Gazebo)` ?
It may not be a problem in the short term, but pkg-config does not support libraries store in paths with spaces, that are common in Windows.
